overview.name: FreelanceProjectPro
overview.description: FreelanceProjectPro is a web application designed to streamline project management for freelancers and their clients. It enables freelancers to securely sign up, manage multiple projects, and track tasks and earnings. Clients can post projects, assign them to freelancers, and communicate through a built-in messaging system.
overview.architecture: Full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend
overview.infrastructure: AWS-based infrastructure with S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and API Gateway

instructions: 2. Install dependencies: npm install (in both frontend and backend)
3. Start development server: npm run dev
4. Build for production: npm run build
